Title: I Gotta Go
Writer: Courtney Kemp Agboh (created by), Randy Huggins, Vladimir Cvetko (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: Tasha grows more and more concerned about Ghosts attitude, so decides to get involved with business at the club more. Ghost and Angela's affair heats up, whilst Tommy is attracted to someone at the club.
